text: Box Hill or Boxhill may refer to: ==Australia== * Box Hill, New South Wales, a suburb of Sydney, Australia * Box Hill, Victoria, a suburb of Melbourne, Australia ==England== * Box Hill, Surrey, a hill in England named for the box woodland it features ** Box Hill & Westhumble railway station * Box Hill, Wiltshire, a village in England ==Elsewhere== * Box Hill railway station, Wellington, a station in New Zealand * Boxhill (Louisville), a historic house in the United States
title: Box Hill
